Text:
"These tapes feature authentic Spanish, in stereo"

One person, talking in Stereo?

Must be someone from "Barceloona"

haha

NizzeHulth

Thank you. These materials are out of print and are becoming harder to get. Still can buy used ones on Amazon. I don't like the newfangled computer programs to learn a language. I don't want to sit in front of a computer.
